perturbation.original_text: 9.3 To remunerate HGF on the basis of thirty percent (30%) of net Company income basis on an annual basis commencing 12 months after the first full 12-month revenue period.

perturbation.original_text: 15.1 The Company will prepare quarterly statements for review by the Parties, released on the 15th day of each subsequent quarter.
perturbation.changed_text: 15.1 The Company will prepare annual statements for review by the Parties, released at the Company's discretion.
perturbation.explanation: Changing the reporting frequency from quarterly to annually and removing the specific release date gives NVOS more latitude, which can result in conflict with auditing and reporting requirements under Canadian Law. NVOS is required to adhere to GAAP, which requires regular reporting on the financial position of a company. Removing the frequency of reporting could result in delays for the tax authorities to receive accurate reporting of revenue and thus result in a penalty fee.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Potential violation of Canadian tax and securities regulations requiring timely and accurate financial reporting.
